channel.title: Anyone have tips on drawing hair?
channel.description:
:| I cannot draw hair for no reason lol. I do spiky ones like narutos, but I wanna join a anime hair like... Its irritating just putting spikes in all my characters head, everyone be like "why all your chars have spikey hair? wtf"
I wanna draw it better...
I wanna draw hair kinda like saske(w/e you call his name) and that girls hair (idk her name but she got pink hair)

item.title: Anyone have tips on drawing hair?
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Ixl Adds Ixl:

but I wanna join a anime hair like…

For one thing almost all anime characters have spikey hair, it looks way better like drawing the eye wrong in anime characters. They look human, but a better form.

Here’s a tutorial… by the people who created “How to Draw Manga”
http://www.cablenet.ne.jp/~japanime/tutorial/hairmain.html

And post here next time about questions:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone have tips on drawing hair?
item.dc:creator: @Immortal Immortal
item.description:
@Immortal wrote:

Different forms of line construct different meaning. Use wavy/curly lines for cool, natural looking hair, straight lines also work sometimes too.
Just experiment, draw up any ideas, look at different sketches from people and draw from them.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have tips on drawing hair?
